_88header.description: Header information about the experiment. Defines the classical and quantum bits

___qubit_labels.description: A list of length number_of_qubits, where each element is either [qreg_name, n] to identify the corresponding physical qubit as the n-th qubit of qreg qreg_name, or null to identify that the corresponding physical qubit has no corresponding qreg
___qubit_labels.title: Map physical qubits to qregs

items.description: The qubit number within the qreg
items.title: qubit number

___clbit_labels.description: A list of pairs [clreg_name, size], to allocate the next size contiguous clbits to clreg clreg_name. The sum of the size-s should equal number_of_clbits
___clbit_labels.title: Map physical clbits to clregs

_88header._constraints: sum(x[1] for x in clbit_labels) == number_of_clbits

_88instructions.description: The instructions that describe the quantum experiment

___config.description: Configuration options that apply to all experiments in this qobj. For options that may be set on a per-experiment basis, these are the defaults.
___config.title: Qobj-level configuration

___backend.description: The backend this qobj was generated for. It may also be able to execute on other backends.

___config.description: Configuration options that apply to only this experiment. Overrides settings from the qobj-level config
___config.title: Experiment-level configuration
